org.cougaar.mts.base
Class MessageStreamsFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.util.GenericStateModelAdapter
      org.cougaar.core.component.ParameterizedComponent
          org.cougaar.mts.base.BoundComponent
              org.cougaar.mts.base.AspectFactory
                  org.cougaar.mts.base.MessageStreamsFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, GenericStateModel
public final class MessageStreamsFactory
extends AspectFactory

This factory is used to create MessageReaders and MessageWriters with a specific list of Aspects. It's not a service primarily because the only client is AttributedMessage, which has no ready access to a ServiceBroker.
